campaign.name: The Magic of Joy
campaign.subtitle: Holiday Season
campaign.overview:
This holiday season, we're bringing the magic of gifting to life across all our travel retail touchpoints. From festive hero banners to personalized product carousels, every element has been designed to inspire travelers and drive conversion during our peak trading period.

The campaign runs from October through December 2025, with key activations aligned to Black Friday, Cyber Monday, and the Christmas gifting window.
